title: Ep158 Anything for Fame Crimes (LA LIVE)
description: This week, the gals take to the glittering hills of Hollywood to chat about people craving notoriety. Topics include the psychology behind bottomless vanity, a death-row celebrity, and the ups and downs of self-publishing. Crack open a bottle of award-winning Barefoot Rosé, hire a publicist, and tune in for Anything for Fame (LA LIVE).
itunes:summary:
This week, the gals take to the glittering hills of Hollywood to chat about people craving notoriety. Topics include the psychology behind bottomless vanity, a death-row celebrity, and the ups and downs of self-publishing. Crack open a bottle of award-winning Barefoot Rosé, hire a publicist, and tune in for Anything for Fame (LA LIVE).
